message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. Given its value, I'm asking for $15,000. I believe this is a fair price considering what it offers. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $15,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more than your offer.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,500?
Alice, thank you for your offer. I still believe that $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. Can we meet at that point?
